idea-plugin.name: JavaScript and TypeScript
idea-plugin.description:
Provides support for JavaScript, TypeScript, and JSX-based frameworks such as React and Next.js. The plugin is bundled in IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate, WebStorm, PhpStorm, PyCharm Professional, RubyMine, GoLand, Rider, and CLion.
Features:
  • Code completion.
  • In-product documentation.
  • Code formatting.
  • Code inspections and quick fixes.
  • Refactorings for JavaScript, TypeScript, and React.
  • Code snippets, or Live Templates.
  • TypeScript Language Service support.
idea-plugin.extensions:
Balance JavaScript reference resolution during inspections highlighting pass.
/>
